name: Pure Cow Milk
content: UB delivers you hygienic, chemical free milk, freshly collected from local farmers.

name: Pure Cow Ghee
content: UB's ghee / clarified butter is traditionally made from pure cow milk.

name: Natural Honey
content: UB's honey is unprocessed, unsweetened and freshly collected from a local farm.

name: Free Range Eggs
content: India's First Certified 'Free-Range' Eggs. Omega 3 enriched eggs from HappyHens.
